name: elm-tailwind-origami
author: Philipp Kr√ºger
description: Generate Elm code for Tailwind Utilities and Components that purges using Elm's --optimize!

scripts.test: yarn test:clean && yarn test:elm-compile && yarn jest
scripts.test:clean: rm -rf test/src && rm -rf test/gen && rm -rf test/dist
scripts.test:elm-compile: node --trace-warnings --unhandled-rejections=strict test/test-run.js && cd test && elm make Main.elm --output=/dev/null
